caption: Two boys were arguing with each other. A teacher came over, grabbed one of the boys by the ear, and led him inside. One boy was reading a book outside, while a man was playing soccer on the field. Then, there was a scene of swimming. In the yard, two men were in an argument. A woman was dressing up a boy and gave him a kiss. Following that, an animated scene appeared. In a classroom, there was a female teacher, and a boy from the back of the class stood up and left his seat, capturing the attention of all the children. A group of children was chatting outdoors.
